website_summaries.verdict: Don't be fooled by its compact dimensions—this little pump gets the job done quickly and relatively quietly, thanks to sound-insulating technology.
pros: Outlet powered, so you never have to worry about recharging batteries
Inflates pools and air mattresses in minutes
Sound insulation board makes it a bit quieter than most
Compact, lightweight, and easy to use
cons: Can get warm quickly and needs to be turned off at the 10 minute mark to prevent overheating

customer_reviews.title: Decent product at a great price but doesn’t deflate
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable product at a great price. Pump works well ONLY on all my inflatables. Powerful and inflated quickly without any effort and without straining the motor. Pump does not heat up with use when inflating BUT heats up dramatically when deflating and works extremely poorly when deflating. I do not recommend this product and I will return and order a better quality inflation/deflation pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Don't Let it Overheat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great airpump for the price! We have used it three or four times in the last week for my son's pool. I love that I have the ability to also pull air from the pool! My only negatives: I wish the cord was longer, giving me a bit more flexibility. I also am concerned a bit by how warm the device got with simply pumping up one pool. I would plan on taking a break between pumping up items so that it doesn't break!
customer_reviews.author: RBrandon

customer_reviews.title: Great, powerful pump.
customer_reviews.text: When I first read that that you shouldn't run this pump longer than 10 minutes, I was worried because my last pump would take 10 minutes to blow up an air mattress. I needn't have worried. This pump could probably blow up a dirigible in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Hatburger

customer_reviews.title: Great air pump! Inflated my pool in minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased an inflatable pool and didn't realize I needed something different to blow it up with. All I had on hand was a bike pump and I naively thought that I could use it. After about 30 minutes and really sore muscles, I decided I better spring for an actual air pump. I saw that this one was pretty highly rated and a decent price so I thought I would give it a try. It worked GREAT! The nozzle adapter fit my inflatable pool perfectly and within minutes I had everything inflated. It was pretty loud, but it did its job quickly for such a small looking pump. Definitely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it once to inflate a 12ft pool. This product is great. It works fast and easy to use. It comes with 2 attachments. 1 for small items that usually have an opening for you to blow air in and one for large items that can only be inflated by a air pump. The pump is small so it can easily be stored and it’s very light weight. It blew up my large pool in about 5-10 min including all the separate parts that need to be blown up. I highly recommend it as a summer must have! I attached a picture of the pool that I used the pump to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The pump got extremely hot when I was using it ...
customer_reviews.text: The pump got extremely hot when I was using it. I’m don’t think it’s going to work for me. I purchase this pump to blow up pool float and a slide. I was told that the pump would work. Most likely to return for a different pump
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Not for autos
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pump to blow up inflatables using the AC inverter outlet on a 2015 Honda Odyssey and a 2018 GMC Sierra. Don't do that. This pump seems to work pretty well at home on house outlets, but stick with the 12v or battery pumps on the road. This is not really a negative review as it works at home, but don't get dissapointed if you buy this to use on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The air pump works great but if you try to air up four inner ...
customer_reviews.text: The air pump works great but if you try to air up four inner tubes with it stops running half way through the third tube then you have to wait about 15 minutes so it can cool down so it will start up again you can air up one and half inner tube before it gets hot and stop running again.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Works but could use some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Does it inflate the pool or float? Yes. Does it work as designed ? Yes. So what's the problem? It needs some improvements to the design. 1. The air pump leaks air from the on / off switch as its running. 2. It also leaks air where the plastic housing comes together to make a seal. In my case it was at the top of the unit. 3. There is a hole by the nozzle where air comes out, this is probably a precaution to stop the pump from over inflating the pool or float. 4. The motor gets really hot which means the plastic case gets hot too. Otherwise it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hani Bandi

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Made quick work of inflating my new ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Made quick work of inflating my new inflatable corner Sofa (love that too). BUt, I was kind of concerned about having to delfate that sofa from time to time, I was pleased at how easily the deflation capability made short work of that as well/ I am well pleased with this product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Great air pump for the price. Powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent relatively inexpensive air pump. After buying a cheaper and weaker air pump that didn't inflate my exercise ball very well, I returned that one and bought this. It's powerful, small and lightweight. The nozzles have a twist/lock mechanism to prevent them from coming off when you pull the pump out of the ball plug. The handle is perfect. My 53cm exercise ball took no time to inflate easily and properly. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Sunday arrived Monday. Fills my double height queen air mattress in under 3 minutes. Deflates it in 3 minutes or less. Does not get hot doing either task. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Don't let price fool you, this is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have an inflator that cost over $80 and it wasn't working enough. I bought another that was over $100 and returned that one because it was not powerful enough to inflate my son's pool. I saw the reviews on this one and boy, do I wish I got this sooner! Inflates my son's 10 foot pool in literally 1 minute. Best inflator and a great price! So happy I bought this
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Wooden

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product was not worth the money. I used it to fill up our kiddie pool. It fills up well with the big nozel, but doesn't with the little one. Then as I go to turn it off the switch won't work and it won't shut off. The only way to turn it off is to unplug it. And it heats up very quickly. It got too hot for me to even continue holding it. Not worth it. Returning asap
customer_reviews.author: Valerie R.

customer_reviews.title: Overheats easily
customer_reviews.text: Overheats easily. Once it overheats it shuts down, and you don’t know if it’s broken or just need to cool off. The instructions don’t indicate that’s a possibility. It takes about 15 minutes for it to cool down before it starts working again.
customer_reviews.author: Deriksen

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This pump is a lot better than I expected. It filled up exercise balls quickly and does not automatically shut off or stop inflating when it decides your items are inflated, as many other electric pumps do. It is very light-weight and stores beautifully -- much better than the pumps I've had in the past. It also did not immediately get hot and we were able to sequentially inflate 5 balls without issue. I would definitely recommend this pump and I have!
customer_reviews.author: FitQueen

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done and is small
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for blowing up pool floats and our Intex 12' pool. I tried to use a hand pump to blow up the top ring of our index pool and it was mostly efficient but I could never get enough air for it to feel firm. I bought this pump and it comes with two nozzles. The larger one was perfect for the pool and the smaller one was perfect for the floats. Downside, the cord is so short!
customer_reviews.author: KgH

customer_reviews.title: OVERHEATS QUICKLY- Look Elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible... should have listened to reviews about the device heating up quickly, especially when deflating. I deflated ONE pool toy and as soon as I went to do the second it shut off. I bought this last-minute before a trip to the beach, and it looks like I'll be doing things the old-fashioned way again! VERY disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead Already
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 2 days ago inflated one pool float fine but when using it for deflating the same pool float today it died. The unit gets very hot and I had to take breaks because I was afraid it was going to catch fire. Needless to say it is now dead- won't turn on at all. Totally waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bugandbear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect air pump for oversized floats, etc.!
customer_reviews.text: This little gem is a lifesaver! We buy the oversized floats for our pool which are a headache to blow up with our car adapter air pump (very time consuming).😩 I recently bought a huge blow up slide thingy ....I ordered this air pump hoping to solve the inflating crisis! It was the perfect solution! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Needed if you have an air mattress this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: If you have an air mattress this is one of the best value types you can get, don't get the ones which are battery powered I did and regret doing so. If your looking to save a little money this is the one to get it will fill up your mattress in a short time and has the power to do so quickly. This is a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dark

customer_reviews.title: Quieter than my Coleman pump
customer_reviews.text: While an air pump will never be quiet, this is quieter than my Coleman and I feel works better. Gotten a scale from this company and it works just fine. See no reason to not rely on them for more good value products.
customer_reviews.author: Barton D.

customer_reviews.title: Works for what we bought it for
customer_reviews.text: We bought this primarily to blow up pool floats and small inflatable pools. It has worked well for these items. It does get warm somewhat quickly but we just turn it off when it does and wait a few minutes before resuming. It's easy enough that my kids use it without any help. It's small and lightweight and powerful enough for what we need. And the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Naverly

customer_reviews.title: Little powerhouse.
customer_reviews.text: When the pump arrived I really did not think it would work. I used it to blow up our grand-kids pool. This unit surprised me as it blew it up in record time and was so easy to use. If it lasts a few seasons, it will have been a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: DavidMC

customer_reviews.title: Moves a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to use as a blower for cleaning things I was working on it the garage. I couldn't justify the cost and space of an air compressor just for cleaning. This thing is great! It really seems to have a lot of pressure and moves a lot of air. Perfect for blowing out crevices in engine compartments or whatever else you are working on.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use and super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and super easy to set up. Totally worth the price. I used it to remove air from vacuum bags but it does function as both a suction pump and inflation pump. I’m really happy I bought this product
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We have quite a large jumpolene bounce house for my kids and this blows it up pretty quickly and does not get hot. The reverse works well but does get warm. Very worth the money I'd say. It is very loud but then what can people really expect it's an air pump..
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: This thing moves air
customer_reviews.text: I used this to fill an adult size inflatable pool and it did the job in minutes. The product feels solid in the hand and of good quality. There are two dings. The cord is a little short but I easily used an extension. The other is that it started to heat up after about 10 mins of use. It did not stop or sputter but I think once I use this outside in the heat it may have to be shut off much sooner to cool down.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Effective Charger
customer_reviews.text: I have several Aerobed air mattresses whose rechargeable pumps have gradually stopped working well (or at all). Rather than buy another Aerobed pump (which I never liked anyway since they couldn't be used on A/C power), I purchased this pump. The larger adapter works well, and the pump is FAST.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Air leaked from everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This said it was a higher pressure than my old one but it had holes in the casing and air leaked from the power button.
customer_reviews.author: hnimsey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for inflatable pool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one to inflate the 92" Homech pool from Amazon. It worked really well. It came with 2 nozzles, one fit perfect to fill up the pool, the other worked perfect for a float. Nice little air pump, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Overheats quickly
customer_reviews.text: It's a good piece of equipment but it over heats very quickly and shuts itself off until it's cool enough to start up again.
customer_reviews.author: rafael

customer_reviews.title: Fast and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Fast, powerful, blows up our lake floaties fuller than any I had previously owned (and in less time). Because it's so fast, I don't see why you would ever need to keep it on for long periods so if it is over heating that is likely user error not a product default. Take breaks if you have 20 floaties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bravo! Perfect for air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Throw away that junky 4-D battery pump that came with your air mattress and buy this!! So much faster and generates more pressure to fill the mattress nice & firm. I had a great night sleep! Works perfectly and fits the opening just fine.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great pump and fast
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and ridiculously fast to inflate an air mattress. A little loud, but that's not really a problem. Also, for a Coleman-style mattress, you have to hold the pump in the valve to make an air seal. This might be a nuisance otherwise, but it's so fast that likewise, it's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: EricAZ

customer_reviews.title: Good, Easy to use, inexpensive Pump for air bed
customer_reviews.text: My Coleman pump went out so needed a new pump fast for an air bed mattress. Got it quick, used it right away, worked so easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: NinaN

customer_reviews.title: Wear gloves!
customer_reviews.text: This does the job, but gets VERY hot while doing it, which is an issue for a hand-held pump. Another small issue I had is the inflator insert is a little too large for most of my inflatables, so you need to cover the leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: This pump is everything we hoped it would be. Compact but very powerful. We have inflatable kayaks, beds, pads etc. and it handles all of them quickly and easily. Highly recommend this product...!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good nozzles, inflates & deflates
customer_reviews.text: Does the job perfectly, pretty useful nozzles they snug well. The only con with it that it overheats pretty quick, I bought it because I wanted to have the ability to inflate a couch or something and to also be able to deflate/vacuum it by taking the air out, saves me time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alfreed

customer_reviews.title: recommend works as stated
customer_reviews.text: Omg! i love it! It works perfectly but I used a hose from another pump to rig it so I wouldn't have to hold it while pumping
customer_reviews.author: sewbiz

customer_reviews.title: So far - Great!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for only this years swimming season, and so far it works great. Very fast to fill floats , but being cautious to only use for 10 minutes straight as dictated by the instructions. In 10 minutes, you can fill many pool floats so I don’t consider that a problem. If I have problems, be sure I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: GZ

customer_reviews.title: Seller's customer service is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Makes inflating a bareble task. I even lost one of the attachments and called and got it back! This seller customer service is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Just Nina

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an inflatable slide for the pool. It is quite large. I tried three different ways to inflate it but none were up to the task. I ordered the Etekcity unit and within 10 minutes after arrival the job was done. Hooray!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Loehn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Big results for a small package. It surprised me how well it pumps up air rafts and such. It’s a little loud but but for the job it does that’s the least of my worries.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great little air pump!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a couple of float tubes from a local sporting goods store. There was nothing on the box indicating a special pump was needed. Found this little gem on Amazon and it does the trick! Easy to store in our camper and works great!
customer_reviews.author: mickeyfreak

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great electric pump. It inflated a queen size mattress in about 10 minutes, no problem. Arrived quickly, price is reasonable. I lost my original pump in a move so this replacement was clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Mall Gift Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really moves a high volume of air fast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I've used it to clean the dust out of my computer and fill up my inflatable pool, which it did so much faster than my compressed air pump <5mins.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Harmeston

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: Loved this pump. It’s small but powerful. I used it to pump up an outdoor pool for my kids. Worked great. Not loud and noisy either.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I want it to.
customer_reviews.text: This is just *so* much easier than jumping up and down on a foot pump! It's strong enough to over-inflate, so keep an eye on what you're doing with it.
customer_reviews.author: BayouBrit

customer_reviews.title: Not great to deflate
customer_reviews.text: This pump works OK to blow up items. As other reviews have said, it gets warm when deflating items. It does not work with pool floats that have a standard small inflation port—even the small attachment is too big to fit and move the flap at the end of the port. I had to modify it with a small tube to fit into the port. Not real convenient. Would recommend getting something else if you goal is to deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: I had to use some duct tape
customer_reviews.text: So, the adapter for my mattress required some duct tape to adapt the outlet and inlet to the right size, but now that I have adapted it for my use, I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: sad sack

customer_reviews.title: Faster than the average pump for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I can vouch for this product firsthand. It is noticably faster than your average pump! The handle is a very appreciated feature. Also, quieter than the average pump. Only downside, it does tend to get hot during extended use.
customer_reviews.author: sue gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an inflatable pool and it works very well. Better than the dang pool, honestly. I have to blow that stupid thing up every two days. Gets a little warm when run for a while but the handle makes that a non-issue. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kevin cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I finally opened this pump to blow up a raft for the pool and the pointed nosil was not included 🙁 I managed without it but it wasn’t easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick and Lora

customer_reviews.title: Great little pump
customer_reviews.text: I love this pump. It worked quickly and easily to inflate a pool and pool toys. You have to watch carefully because it works so quickly you can easily over-inflate items. I just wish it had an attachment for bicycle tires.
customer_reviews.author: Kona4554

customer_reviews.title: This will blow up a Pool in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: This pump rocks will blow up an outdoor pool in 10 minutes, i tried the ones from home dep0t and they failed in comparison
customer_reviews.author: EINTESLA

customer_reviews.title: Our new Air pump
customer_reviews.text: Our old air pump stopped working so we purchased a new one. We like the fact that it has a handle for ease of handling and it works really fast. We wanted one to blow up our spare bed for guests on rare occasions and this should do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. I'm concerned about longevity
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to inflate three large pool floats in no time, and deflate them as well. It does heat up a fair amount. The instructions say not to run it longer than 10 minutes straight. The plastic seems pretty cheap. The cord could also be longer. But at the price point I can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: mokhan

customer_reviews.title: No additional attachments for sale
customer_reviews.text: The pump has worked well for me. However, my tip got bend (i think because it got kind of warm) and eventually it broke off enough that I cannot fully insert it to deflate well. Thought I would buy additional tips. Looks like they don't sell them. WHY? People can lose or break these things. Next time I buy a product like this, I will remember to look for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: rstark

customer_reviews.title: good pressure. I have used it at least 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is exactly what I was hoping it would be. Small, light, good pressure. I have used it at least 30 times with no issues. Just make sure when you use the nozzles, they are on tight. It gets hot after a couple minutes of solid use, but it is strong enough for most inflatable swim products.
customer_reviews.author: David Burgreen

customer_reviews.title: Overheats!!!
customer_reviews.text: First use inflating noticed the extreme heat on the product. When I went to deflate the water tube it over heated and turned off. So 1 star from me.
customer_reviews.author: xoDeviousox

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. Works for what I needed but I wish it wouldn't heat up so quick and stop working. Used to pump a 10'x104' pool. Had to wait 45 minutes before it cooled down to finish pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy V.

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It inflates my workout ball fast and i use it for when i camp to inflate my couch that converts to a bed. It inflates it quickly (less than 5 minutes?)
customer_reviews.author: Juni

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This small unit is a powerhouse. It filled up my inflatable pool in under a minute. My only complaint is that the cord is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Hillel Kaminsky

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This would not blow up a pool float no matter what I tried. Totally wasted my money, and it’s too late now to return it. I ended up using a bicycle tire pump to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: cjer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works fast!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so easy to use! The only problem I had was the tip of the attachment for pool toys etc. cracked the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Adams

customer_reviews.title: Pool Float Saver !
customer_reviews.text: Great item...!!! What a lifesaver..or breath saver....for the pool floats this weekend.... works very well....so glad I have this!
customer_reviews.author: ptre77

customer_reviews.title: Best inflator yet
customer_reviews.text: The Etekcity Electric air Pump High Power Quick-Fill Air Mattress Inflator is the best air pump I have found. It has more pressure than others I have tried. Price is reasonable, delivery is generally quick. I use these for making active bird deterrents. The are quiet and reliable. Very happy to have found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Glaukos

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected and works fast!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as it says and expected. Blows up pool floats super quick (even the large Inflat-a-bull). Wall plug in seems to make a big difference vs battery powered models...coming from using an inflator designed for an air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works great used it to pump up some rafting tubes at the mountains out ford Flex has a 110 plug in it so Don't have to worry about the other charging kind that didn't last we owned
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Fast, quiet, and easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the pump did not have a hose, but it worked quite easily without one. And the volume of air delivered is more than expected. I inflated a kid's 3 tier pool in less than 5 minutes. Adaptor fit snugly in opening too. Very happy with your product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carney

customer_reviews.title: inflates and deflates in no time!
customer_reviews.text: this product is powerful, lightweight, and easy to use. I bought it so that i could inflate a large pool for my grandchildren and take it back down after the weekend. It worked amazingly quickly both inflating the pool and getting the air back out.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Driver

customer_reviews.title: Filled up and deflated my Intex pool quickly
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Adapter worked great with my inflatable pool. The deflation also worked very well. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: You may need an extension cord if blowing up a really big pool tou
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use, just plug it in and blow up things I used it for my air mattress canopy island
customer_reviews.author: KKS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the item with earliest delivery date.
customer_reviews.text: It heats up rather quickly. Comes with 2 attachments so it’s a bummer while trying to inflate a child’s float. I only purchased this item because of quickest delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Venturo

customer_reviews.title: Good electric pump
customer_reviews.text: Very fast/powerful, but like other reviews state, it heats up quick. I wouldn't recommend over using it in one setting.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Hable

customer_reviews.title: Great pump, great value
customer_reviews.text: Filled my Cal King air mattress in about 1 minute! Very easy to use Arrived earlier than expected Nice follow up from vendor
customer_reviews.author: RubyT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pools and inflatables
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I have a large blow-up pool for kids and most air pumps are for blowing up tires, etc. This inflated the entire pool in less than a minute. Didn't get hot or loud at all.
customer_reviews.author: GeekParrot

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Pump! Effortless and Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this air pump!! Came with three different adapters so multi faceted! I quickly and effortlessly blew up air mattresses for our lake use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Durack

customer_reviews.title: Too powerful for my car outlet
customer_reviews.text: works great in standard outlet at home. too powerful for the car outlet. I either need a new converter for the car outlet or buy a less powerful one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Blew up pool toys and floats in ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Was I surprised how quick and efficient this inexpensive air pump is. Love it. Blew up pool toys and floats in a heartbeat. Great quick shipping too. Well Done!!
customer_reviews.author: Dane S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect easy to use and very simple. Filled up the stability ball very easily
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in crushed box. Pump destroyed
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to write a review on the quality of this product. Unfortunately it arrived completely destroyed. The box was crushed and the pump was split open. I have to get one so I’m picking one up at Target instead. Never buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: terrence s ryan

customer_reviews.title: What a STEAL
customer_reviews.text: This device is AMAZING. It inflated this Intex swimming pool in less than 2 minutes .Its a steal for only $19. Im beyond impressed. AMAZING!!! Thank you Amazon, Thank you Etekcity.
customer_reviews.author: Klo  Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I broke one of the attachments. Called the company to see if I could buy a replacement. Customer service rep said she would check and e-mail me. The next day I received an e-mail to let me know they would just send a new pump at no charge. That was over the top customer service! And the product was everything it was advertised to be. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Allows me to inflate two twin size air mattresses in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Tao Jones

customer_reviews.title: Really good product.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old camping air pump that ran off the cigarette lighter in your vehicle. This is a really great product. And I no longer have to inflate items in the car/garage.
customer_reviews.author: L'Kul

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to blow up my pool floats which are really big and it does a great job!! It inflates them very quickly and was a great buy, would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Exactly as stated. Blew my inflatable watermelon up in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for kids pools!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to inflate our kiddie pool this summer. Works fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not very strong
customer_reviews.text: this is my second air pump and it takes longer with this one to fill the inflatables.
customer_reviews.author: MGE

customer_reviews.title: This thing actually works great
customer_reviews.text: This air pump blew up all my pool floats, small and huge, in record time. I returned two others that did nothing. This works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Debann8487

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used the air pump several times over a weekend and it worked great. Fast inflation of airbeds without any issues. It survived a busy weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Holly W

customer_reviews.title: Air Pump is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the Etekcity Electric Air Pump a few times since I got it, but it fills my inflatable water rafts quickly and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: CTKen

customer_reviews.title: works fine but does get hot after using
customer_reviews.text: works fine but does get hot after using. So can not hold it too long and I don't think good for large floats. Small floats for babies and todders its fine.
customer_reviews.author: First for a Jessica shoe

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you have a power source nearby. Used it to fill my kids pool
customer_reviews.author: prescottkid

customer_reviews.title: It works perfect it inflated my grandkids pool with no problem I ...
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect it inflated my grandkids pool with no problem I told a bunch my friends that go camping to check into it for their mattresses and there rafts
customer_reviews.author: HERBERT HOOD

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Will fill your mattress or inflate anything quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Locke

customer_reviews.title: FAST AND EASY
customer_reviews.text: It blew up a ex large kiddie pool in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: debra schulman

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. We were able to quickly inflated and deflate kids' air mattresses. It is small and lightweight, which will make it easier to bring with us. The power cord is not long but hasn't been a problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Wessling

product_meta.title: Etekcity Electric Air Pump High Power Quick-Fill Air Mattress Pump Inflator Deflator for Inflatables Raft Bed Boat Pool Toy with Nozzles, 110-120V (250W, 8000Pa)
feature_bullets: SUPER HIGH-QUALITY PERFORMANCE: Our portable electric air pump uses a unique High Pressure Design for a faster inflatable experience, at 1.2PSI (8000 Pa), higher than most normal AC hand pumps on the market; Fill queen-size and king-size air mattresses in half the time this inflator takes with traditional hand pumps

INTERLOCKING NOZZLES: The various sizes of nozzles can fit most inflatables; The portable pump’s nozzles stay lock-secured on the electric air pump during use; Works well with air mattresses, pools, rafts, sofas, bathtub, water beds, boat, pool toys, swimming rings etc

UNIQUE SOUND INSULATION DESIGN: This air inflator’s unique sound insulation board will bring your quite life a double protection; This special design will greatly reduce the spread of its noise; While getting rid of the loud sound, this splendid material of our pump will not increase the weight of it, which let this electric pump still compact and practical

METAL IMPELLER FOR FASTEST WORKING: The airbed pump uses an advanced wheel design and high-quality metal impellers (instead of inferior plastic impellers that are often used in market), which will bring the mattress pump a better balance effect of vibration; This unique material will let you enjoy a most efficient inflation or deflation process than other plastic wheels

SAFELY DESIGNED BALL BEARING:Our portable hand air pump uses a particular built-in ball bearing, which performs better than simple plastic bearings; the air pump engine runs more smoothly and be protected from high temperatures; ETL Listed; 1-year warranty (with the free option to extend it by 1 more year when you register online) and lifetime support provided by Etekcity
